# Changelog

All notable changes to `laravel-mix-preload` will be documented in this file.

## 1.2.2 - 2020-09-09

- Support Laravel 8

## 1.2.0
- Add font support

## 1.1.0
- Add Laravel 7.0 support

## 1.0.1 - 2020-01-20
- Add support for manifests versioned with query string

## 1.0.0 - 2019-10-21
- First release
